addr: 746 West Adams Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90089
title: USC GamePipe Showcase
desc: The USC Viterbi School of Engineering invites you to the GamePipe Laboratory?s Fall Showcase. Shown at that event will be games & technologies built in classes held in the GamePipe Laboratory Fall semester, including work from the mobile, networked, immersive, engines & advanced games courses. http://gamepipe.usc.edu Directions to the USC GamePipe Laboratory http://gamepipe.usc.edu/About/About.html
